name: Backtrack (itch) (DaimenPN)
description:
CONTROLS

  • WASD to move
  • ESC to return to Main Menu

GOAL

  • Reach the Crown to complete a level.
  • You don't have to collect every Point to unlock the next level, you just need to get to the end.

SPEEDRUN MODE

When you enable Speedrun Mode in your settings, all of your current progress will be wiped, and a timer will appear. You are timed for the time you spent in levels, not in menus. To record your highscore locally, you MUST 100% each level (aka collect all 'Points'). 

I might add a global leaderboard and a way to clear your Highscore later. For now...

100% Speedrun Record--Any% Speedrun Record1:12.25RMG

Manually send me your time if you beat either record :)
